column4: In feisty, after starting sudo pon dsl-provider /etc/resolv.conf receives 2 dns name servers from my ISP, BUT after a while those dns names get lost replaced by "nameserver 192.168.1.1" entry. Surfing the Net impossible. Help.
i got the same error a time ago. it is related to someone close to you has connected a cheap router backwards to Internet.
i think you need to add "reject 192.168.1.1" to your dhclient.conf
